title: Is creativity a talent or skill? - Quora

response.answer_text: Creativity is neither a skill nor a talent. However, creativity demands you have talent and hone skills. Creativity is a desire to find a way to solve a problem.In the traditional arts of drawing, painting, sculpting the problem is how to best represent or convey and idea or a concept of a feeling or an emotion using the medium of choice.If you have no desire to solve a problem, even one of your own making, you are not going to be creative, how ever much innate talent or skilled you may be.

I personally believe that creativity and talent are closely related but are two separate things. You have an inborn talent which you found out while you were growing up which was about the skill on carpentry.
